import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useFormik } from "formik" import { ApplySchema } from "../Schemas"; const initialValues = { first_name: "", last_name: "", email: "", phone: "" } const ApplyForm = () => { const {values, errors, handleBlur, handleChange, handleSubmit} = useFormik({ initialValues: initialValues, validationSchema: ApplySchema, onSubmit: (values) => { console.log( " ~ file: ApplyForm.jsx ~ line 11 ~ applyy ~ values", values ); }, }); const postData = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const { first_name, last_name, email, phone } = values const res = await fetch("/ApplyForm", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ first_name, last_name, email, phone }) }); const data = await res.json() if (data.status === false || !data) { window.alert("Invalid Registration") console.log("invalid registration") } else { window.alert("Registration successfull") console.log("successfull registration") } } return (

E-VISA APPLICATION













) } export default ApplyForm
